name: 0xmons
introduce: 0xmons are scarce, digital collectibles that live on the Ethereum blockchain. They are inspired by a mix of Pokemon, SCP, and Lovecraft. Every 0xmon has a unique animation generated by a GAN (Generative Adversarial Network) trained on pixel art images.This image is then paired with a unique name, epithet, and lore that comes from a generative language model (think GPT-3).
